overview: Mike spent eight and one-half years at Churchill Capital, Inc., most recently as a Managing Principal, managing the mezzanine investment team. Prior to joining Churchill, Mike worked for approximately 11 years at First Bank (nka U.S. Bank) and three years at Norwest Bank (nka Wells Fargo Bank) in various corporate banking positions. He holds a BS with Distinction from the University of Nebraska (1980) and performed MBA coursework at the University of Nebraska at Omaha.
